resources.string: Dear all Users,NPS Arts Rautahat app is a platform for the Nepal Police School Students where they can show and share their creations with school family.As well as they can access all the articles of the NPS students online anywhere anytime they wants.

Students should follow the following conditions for posting the articles.

1.Students should not post controversy articles
2.They should not use rough words that might hurt someone feeling.


Notice: If any users using this application violets the terms and conditions then we will take a legal action against their profile
